author: dain
msg: Use reflection to determin if an ejb implements the TimedObject interface.  This change is required because the deployers see different versions of the spec classes then are used for the deployed objects themselves.  This change should be reverted once the deployment classloader structure is fixed.

author: djencks
msg: don't remove a required / from an abstract name query

author: djencks
msg: Don't insist that explicit name queries in ejb-refs can be resolved at deploy time

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-1916 port modified ref 371145 from trunk, remove need for openejb classes in all jndi contexts
